package com.hcltech.project;

import java.util.Scanner;
public class Ticket 
{

	public static void main(String[] args) 
	{
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		//menu
		Scanner sc= new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.print("Enter your name:");
		String name= sc.nextLine();
		System.out.println("Enter your age:");
		int age=sc.nextInt();
		int low=10;
		int middle=10;
		int upper=10;
		//print seat avalability
		if(low<=0 && middle <=0 && upper<=0)
		{
			System.out.println("No seats available!!!");
		}
		else
		{
			System.out.println("Select your berth preference: L or M or U");
			String ch=sc.next();
			switch(ch)
			{
				case "L": if(low>0)
						{
							System.out.println("Lower berth confirmed");
							low--;
						}
						else if(middle>0)
						{
							System.out.println("Middle berth confirmed");
							middle--;
						}
						else
						{
							System.out.println("Upper berth confirmed");
							upper--;
						}
				break;
				
				case "M" : if(middle >0)
							{
								System.out.println("Middle berth confirmed");
								middle--;
							}
							else if(upper>0)
							{
								System.out.println("Upper berth confirmed");
								upper--;
							}
							else
							{
								System.out.println("Lower berth confirmed");
								low--;
							}
				break;
				
				case "U" :if(upper >0)
							{
								System.out.println("Upper berth confirmed");
								upper--;
							}
							else if(low>0)
							{
								System.out.println("Lower berth confirmed");
								low--;
							}
							else
							{
								System.out.println("Middle berth confirmed");
								middle--;
							}
				break;
				
				default:System.out.println("Invalid Input");
				
				
			}
			
			
		}
		sc.close();
		

	}

}
